DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text quantification of the intensity and percentage of staining activity in a predictive marker for chemosensitivity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics and conditions that have a bearing on the likelihood of a person developing a disease or disorder._Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc_Analysis; examination and interpretation._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics and conditions that have a bearing on the likelihood of a person developing a disease or disorder.:Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc

Concepts.definition: Characteristics and conditions that have a bearing on the likelihood of a person developing a disease or disorder.

A characteristic that can be objectively measured and serves as an indicator for normal biologic processes, pathogenic processes, state of health or disease, the risk for disease development and/or prognosis, or responsiveness to a particular therapeutic intervention.

Property.preferredDefinition: Analysis; examination and interpretation.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: Discoloration of patient tissue(s) produced by absorption of, or contact with, foreign matter, such as with medical dyes.: An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Discoloration of patient tissue(s) produced by absorption of, or contact with, foreign matter, such as with medical dyes.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Concepts.definition: A minimum level or position or degree; less than normal in degree, intensity or amount.
Discoloration of patient tissue(s) produced by absorption of, or contact with, foreign matter, such as with medical dyes.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
